{'parameter': 'Lionel Messi'}.response: The name 'Lionel Messi' is not associated with an artist on allmusic.com, but rather it is the name of a world-renowned Argentine professional footballer who has played for clubs such as FC Barcelona and Paris Saint-Germain, as well as the Argentina national team. Lionel Messi is widely considered one of the greatest football players of all time. He has received numerous awards and honors throughout his career, including multiple FIFA Ballon d'Or titles, which are awarded to the best football player in the world annually.
